trans-unit.source: Provides digital rights management services for encrypting and decrypting protected content.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços de gestão para a encriptação e desencriptação de conteúdo protegido de direitos digitais.

trans-unit.source: CryptoProvider is created as a result of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A> method when binding a rights managed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: CryptoProvider é criado como resultado de <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>método quando se vincula uma direitos geridos <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>para <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, CryptoProvider is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Tal como com outros <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>tipos, CryptoProvider só é utilizado em aplicações de fidedignidade total.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho do bloco de cifras, em bytes.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*BlockSize bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: O `clearText` e `cipherText` memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>e <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>tem de ser n * tamanho de bloco bytes de comprimento, onde ' N'é um número inteiro maior que ou igual a 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `false`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>é `false`, memórias intermédias transmitido <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>tem</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> de ser o mesmo comprimento memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `true`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of BlockSize bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>é `true`, memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>pode ter um comprimento diferente de memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(todos os tamanhos de memória intermédia tem ainda sempre de ser um múltiplo de tamanho de bloco de bytes de comprimento).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BlockSize of 1 indicates that the cipher is a stream cipher; a BlockSize of 2 or greater indicates a block cipher.
trans-unit.target: Um tamanho de bloco de 1 indica que as cifras é uma cifra de fluxo; um tamanho de bloco de 2 ou superior indica uma cifra de blocos.

trans-unit.source: The cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do bloco cifra, em bytes.

trans-unit.source: The default block size for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] is 8.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do bloco predefinido para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] é 8.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection listing the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de listar os direitos que passaram na verificação e que são concedidas ao utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A collection enumerating the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção a enumerar os direitos que passaram na verificação e que são concedidas ao utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o utilizador tem direitos para desencriptar.

trans-unit.source: CanDecrypt returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user read access rights such as View, Edit, Print, or Owner.
trans-unit.target: Devolve CanDecrypt **verdadeiro** se o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>vinculados a este <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>concede ao utilizador direitos de acesso de leitura como ver, editar, imprimir ou proprietário.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to decrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se o <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> concede direitos de utilizador para desencriptar; caso contrário, **falso**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o utilizador tem direitos para encriptar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A> returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user write access rights such as Edit or Owner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>Devolve **verdadeiro** se o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>vinculados a este <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>concede ao utilizador direitos de acesso de escrita como editar ou proprietário.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense></xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to encrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se o <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> concede direitos de utilizador a encriptar; caso contrário, **falso**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> can accept buffers that are different block sizes in length.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se <> </> *> e <> </> *> pode aceitar a bloquear de memórias intermédias diferentes tamanhos de comprimento.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1. If CanMergeBlocks is **false**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>. If CanMergeBlocks is **true**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: O `clearText` e `cipherText` memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>e <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>tem de ser n* <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes de comprimento, onde ' N'é um número inteiro maior que ou igual a 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Se for CanMergeBlocks * *falso**, memórias intermédias transmitido <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>tem</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> de ser o mesmo comprimento memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> Se for CanMergeBlocks * *verdadeiro**, memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>pode ter um comprimento diferente de memórias intermédias transmitido a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(todos os tamanhos de memória intermédia sempre ainda tem de ser um múltiplo de <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>bytes de comprimento).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> can be a different length from the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*>; otherwise, **false** if the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> must be the exact same length.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se a memória intermédia transmitida para <> </> *> pode ter um comprimento diferente da memória intermédia transmitido para <> </> *>; caso contrário, **falso** se memórias intermédias transmitido a <> </> *> e <> </> *> tem de ser o mesmo comprimento exato.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] the default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] a predefinição é **verdadeiro**.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts cipher text to clear text.
trans-unit.target: Desencripta cifras texto para limpar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: O texto de cifra para desencriptar.

trans-unit.source: The decrypted clear text of cryptoText.
trans-unit.target: O desencriptados limpar o texto de cryptoText .

trans-unit.source: cipherText is null.
trans-unit.target: cipherTexté nulo.

trans-unit.source: Decryption right not granted.
trans-unit.target: Desencriptação à direita não concedida.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dispose performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Efetua Dispose <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>foi occupying.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>referências.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts clear text to cipher text.
trans-unit.target: Encripta o texto não encriptado para texto de cifras.

trans-unit.source: The byte length of the `clearText` buffer should be a multiple of the cipher <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de byte do `clearText` memória intermédia deve ser um múltiplo da cifra <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital rights management system uses [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] block cipher.
trans-unit.target: Utilizações de sistema de gestão de direitos a digital [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] bloquear cifras.

trans-unit.source: With [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], blocks are encrypted independently such that two blocks of identical clear text produce identical cipher text results.
trans-unit.target: Com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], blocos são encriptados independentemente, de modo a que os dois blocos de texto não encriptado idêntico produzem resultados de texto de cifra idênticos.

trans-unit.source: To minimize potential decryption threats from independent block encryption, applications should employ methods to modify content, such as compression, to avoid encrypting identical clear text blocks.
trans-unit.target: Para minimizar a potenciais ameaças de desencriptação da encriptação de bloco independentes, as aplicações devem recorrer a métodos para modificar o conteúdo, tal como compressão, para evitar a encriptar os blocos de texto não encriptado idênticos.

trans-unit.source: The clear text content to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de texto não encriptado para encriptar.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted cipher text of the given clearText.
trans-unit.target: Encriptados texto de cifra da determinada clearText .

trans-unit.source: clearText is null.
trans-unit.target: clearTexté nulo.

trans-unit.source: Encryption is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Não é permitida a encriptação.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs internal cleanup before the instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Liberta recursos e efetua a limpeza interna antes da instância está recuperada através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Finalize performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Finalize efetua <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação não deve chamar este método; um objeto `Finalize` método é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, a menos que Finalização pelo garbage collector foi desativada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
